instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: 820-00850 No image on the touch bar
threads.message:
After a drop, no image on the touch bar, but the touch is still working.
Also, I can't install the os, is giving me an error.

threads.title: 820-00850 No image on the touch bar
threads.message:
Dropped machine is nightmare.
What is the error you get?

threads.title: 820-00850 No image on the touch bar
820-00850 No image on the touch bar
threads.message: When i click update it try to update then i get error message again.

threads.title: 820-00850 No image on the touch bar
threads.message:
This is the classic Touchbar issue and you can find a lot of info on the forum.
Use search function and collect data from different threads.

Disconnect internal LCD and test the machine with external monitor.
You can also disconnect camera connector from the shell only.

threads.title: 820-00850 No image on the touch bar
threads.message:
I disconnected the camera connector, internal screen, touch id, always no image on touch bar.
i reflowed T2 chip, UB00 same problem...

threads.title: 820-00850 No image on the touch bar
threads.message: Did you try all the steps mentioned in dukefawks thread???
